checkForUpdates.name: Check For Updates
checkForUpdates.description: Check for updates on startup. Reccomended to be enabled!

history.name: History
history.description: Always stores the sucsessful uploads in a json file.

minimizeToTray.name: Minimize To Tray
minimizeToTray.description: Minimizes the app to the system tray instead of closing it.

notifyYou.name: Notify You
notifyYou.description: Send you a notification when it's sending, when it's done and when it gives an error.
